'''Deepwood Dweller's Estimation''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Deepwood Dweller's Estimation is obtainable from a [[Remarkable Chest]] in [[Sumeru]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest to the west of the northern Teleport Waypoint in [[Old Vanarana]].
<gallery>
Item Deepwood Dweller's Estimation Location.png|Map location
Item Deepwood Dweller's Estimation Context.png|Additional Context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe

|time = 14h

}}
